resources.string: Not a Member yet? Sign Up here.
By clicking SignUp you agree all the Terms and Conditions.
Please enter your Registered Email Id below:
Something went wrong please try again later

Thank you for your purchase. We hope you are happy with your purchase. However, if you are not completely satisfied with your purchase for any reason, you may return it to us for a full refund or credit or an exchange only. Please see below for more information on our return and refund policy.
The following is the return policy as applicable to all items sold on www.stygianstore.com.

1. In general, an item may be eligible for return within 7 days of the purchase date. The product can be returned if it fulfils one or more of the following conditions: Was delivered in a physically damaged condition. Has missing parts or accessories. Is different from what was ordered. Is different from its description on the product detail page on website. Products marked as non-returnable on the product detail page cannot be returned. 2. All items must be returned in their original condition, with price tags intact, user manual, warranty cards, original accessories and in the original manufacturer’s box/packaging as delivered to you. We may reject the return pickup or reject the returned item if the items are not returned according to the policy mentioned or the item is not in a saleable condition. 3. If you wish to return an electronic device that stores any personal information, please ensure that you have removed all such personal information from the device prior to returning. The Company or the marketplace shall not be liable in any manner for any misuse or usage of such information. 4. In some cases, items may not be eligible for return, including cases of buyer\'s remorse such as incorrect model or colour of product ordered or incorrect product ordered. 5. Some of the goods available on the website may have a different return and refund policy which shall be applicable only for the product where such policy is specifically mentioned. In that case, this general policy will not be applicable to such products or class or products.

To return an item, initiate the return process by sending an email to the customer service at __________________________ [email address] to confirm about the goods to be returned. After receiving the confirmation of the return, place the item securely in its original packaging and include your proof of Purchase /and the return form provided (If any). A representative from the Shipping partner of the company or seller will come and inspect the conditions on which the return can be executed and if all the conditions are met he will take the item back and will issue the Goods Return slip which shall be the proof that the goods has been returned and delivered to the seller. In no case, the return shall be processed by Stygianstore.com, but we will only be assisting in the whole process. The return shall be processed by the seller of the product.

In any case where a refund is required, the sellers need to authorise that refund. Stygianstore.com can assist in facilitating refunds for you only when the seller notifies us of the receipt of the item. Generally, the seller will process the refund within 7 days from the receipt of the product by the seller. Once the seller notifies us of the receipt of the return item, the following timelines apply for the amount to be credited.

In Rare circumstances, there may be delay in crediting of the refund amount even after it being processed by the seller’s bank. In such case, you may have to contact your bank for crediting the same to your account. The products which are categorized “nonreturnable”, no request for its refund or return or exchange will be taken unless the conditions mentioned in Clause 1 of the return policy is applicable.

India 15-40 
 Business days 
United States 10-30 Business days 
Canada, Europe 10-30 Business days 
Australia, New Zealand 10-30 Business days 
Mexico, Central America, South America 15-30 Business days 
Max delivery time – 45 business days.
We are glad to bring our customers great value and service. That’s why we provide free shipping from our warehouses.
We are proud to offer international shipping services. However, there are some locations we are unable to ship to. If you happen to be from one of those countries we will contact you.

We are not responsible for any custom fees once the items have shipped. By purchasing our products, you consent that one or more packages may be shipped to you and may get custom fees when they arrive to your country.
Shipping time varies by location. These are our estimates:

You will receive an email with a tracking number once your order is shipped but sometimes due to free shipping tracking is not available. For logistical reasons, items in the same purchase may be sent in separate packages even if you’ve specified combined shipping.
